description: This file defines the AudioController class, which manages audio playback state, including queue management, play/pause toggling, navigation, and a mock timing mechanism for progress simulation in a Flutter app.

classes.name: AudioController
classes.description: A controller responsible for managing audio playback state, including a mock implementation of playback progression using a timer. Extends ChangeNotifier to notify listeners of state changes.

methods.name: setQueue
methods.description: Sets the playback queue with a list of songs, optionally starting at a specific index and auto-playing.

methods.name: togglePlayPause
methods.description: Toggles the current playback state between playing and paused.

methods.name: play
methods.description: Starts playback if not already playing.

methods.name: next
methods.description: Advances to the next song in the queue, looping to start if at the end.

methods.name: previous
methods.description: Goes back to the previous song in the queue, looping to end if at the start.

methods.name: seek
methods.description: Seeks to a specified position within the current song.
